title: sonnAl mangaLam tarumE rukmini shubha
sahitya:
sonnAl mangaLam tarumE rukmiNi shubha yOga kalyANa vaibhOgamE


anupallavi

  tannErillAda mannan gOpAlakrSNan ennEramum tangum hrdayam koNDAL ponnADum nANamura 
pozhiyamuda adaram pOdum aghalAda pullAnkuzhalinishai Udi ulagALum uttamanai maNandadai


caraNam    vaLamAna vidarbham enroru nADu angE matiyODu bhISman Alum nannADu 
uLamODulagam pugazh ponnADu engaL uttamak-kaNNukkETra mAmanAr vIDu
oru mati kadirenum oLi vizhikkaNDu UrulagamEyak-kaLikkumE
uyar tavam aramenum poruLgaLum uNarndu uttamamene niraindirukkumE
adilum uravADum malar maghal ulAvum agha niraindaruLivaip-perukkumE
AnandamAghap-paNkalandilanai aDiyavar kETTAl tiLaikkumE
